Updated patch in a single file with proper paths

Thanks for the patch. Next time, please:

1. Don't use a ZIP file: post the patch as text.
2. Post a single file that contains the changes to all files, rooted at the project root. See my patch file as an example.

This makes our lives much easier as we don't have to do around patching files individually.
